title: Interpretation of a dream about a wedding dress for a fiancée

preview.html: There is no doubt that many of Eve's daughters have these dreams, as it is very common for them to see a wedding dress and then look for someone to explain to her the vision of the white dress together in it. Interpretation of a dream about a wedding dress for a fiancée If the fiancée dreams of wearing a wedding dress, this may be a sign that Her subconscious mind thinks a lot about her wedding preparations. When a fiancée dreams of cutting her wedding dress, this may indicate that the level of economic engagement is low, and God knows best. If the fiancée sees a wedding dress in her dream, this is a strong indicator and good news that she will hear news that will bring great happiness to her heart. When an unmarried girl dreams of a wedding dress during an engagement, this may indicate the existence of a strong love relationship between her and her fiancé. When an engaged girl sees a wedding dress in her dream, this may be an indication of the imminent date of her marriage to the one she loves. In the event that the fiancée sees a long wedding dress This indicates that the girl has better morals, and it also indicates the religiosity of the fiancé. When the fiancée sees in her dream that the wedding dress is lost, this is not good, as it indicates the engagement being broken, and God knows best. When you see your fiancée in a dream in the wedding dress, this may indicate the extent of Her happiness in the coming period, which will make up for her past. If the fiancée sees in a dream that the wedding dress is a bit dirty, this may mean that the fiancée may face some problems in the coming days, but they will go away soon, God willing. Many interpreters have indicated that the vision of the engagement She wears a white wedding dress in her dream, which may indicate good news, as everything she dreamed of has been achieved in a very short time. When the fiancée sees in her dream the wedding dress full of decorations and embroidery, this may indicate the approaching date of her upcoming marriage with the one she loves. And when the fiancée sees the dress The wedding in her dream, and in reality there were some problems between her and her fiancé, it may be news that these problems will end and after that we will return to the beautiful romance between them. When the bride sees in her dream that the wedding dress is on fire, this may be a harbinger that she and those with her will be exposed to difficulties and crises in the future. Ibn Sirin says that if an unmarried woman sees a white wedding dress in her dream, this may indicate that she is distinguished by good character, and this also indicates that she knows her religion well. Ibn Sirin points out that if an unmarried woman sees a wedding dress in her dream and she is young, this may indicate that a lot of good will happen to her or her family. When an unmarried woman sees a wedding dress in a dream and falls in love with someone, it may be an indication of... They will separate soon, and God knows best. Ibn Sirin confirms that if an unmarried woman is seen wearing a white dress without the groom. This may indicate that she is trying hard to change the reality around her, because she wants a better reality for her life. If an unmarried woman dreams that she is wearing a white dress. This may indicate that she is trying hard to change the reality around her, because she wants a better reality for her life. This indicates a

title: Interpretation of a dream about seeing a group of men in a dream and its repercussions

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about seeing a group of men in a dream: The large number of gatherings and people in dreams is one of the things that arouses curiosity and stimulates the mind and reason to learn the many evidence and explanations around it. There are those who panicked when they saw gatherings of men in a dream, for this reason we will go to this article to get an explanatory statement. .Dream of seeing a group of men in a dream.Interpretation of the dream of many men in our house about a married woman.If many men see a married woman in a dream, this means that the woman is comparing her husband to other men and it also means that she is not satisfied with what she lives with. Here are other clues to interpret the dream of many men in our house about a married woman: Whoever sees in her dream that there are many men looking at her with admiration, this indicates that she is suffering from neglect on the part of her husband. It means the emotional emptiness in which she lives. It also means that A married woman actually needs care and attention. If a married woman sees in her dream that there are men speaking positively to the married woman, this means that the dreamer is a wonderful ideal wife. It also means that she is responsible for her home and her husband. If a married woman sees a lot of men speaking to her positively Unpleasant, this indicates the presence of serious disagreements with the husband’s family. It also indicates dissatisfaction with the relationship between her and her husband’s family. A married woman sees many people in her sleep and some of them give her water and food. It means your financial stability. A handsome man in a married woman’s dream means Happiness. If the dreamer’s marital life is unstable and constantly conflicts with her husband, the dream heralds good circumstances between them. Interpretation of seeing a group of men in a dream for a single woman by Ibn Sirin. The scholar Ibn Sirin interpreted seeing a group of men in a dream for married and unmarried people as well as for men, and in this The paragraph will talk about the interpretation of seeing a group of men in one dream, such as: Explained in the following points: The respected scholar Ibn Sirin interpreted seeing a group of men chasing a girl in a dream as meaning that something bad happened to her. Or she may be confused when making certain decisions. Perhaps this indicates The need to get closer to God. If an unmarried woman sees people she does not know in her dream, this means goodness and happiness that she will receive in the coming days. Also, if a single woman sees a group of men entering her house, stability and calm may indicate that she will achieve her goals soon. The company of men in one dream, especially if it is large, means abundant goodness that an unmarried woman will witness in the coming period. Walking in a dream with single men she does not know may indicate that she will marry soon, her marriage will be happy and her husband will enjoy a high degree of justice and good morals. This, by God, is Most High and Most Knowing. See also: Interpretation of a dream about seeing an elevator and its reflections in a dream Interpretation of meeting men in a dream for divorced women Meeting men in a divorced woman’s dream is a praiseworthy vision, and this means alleviating her worries, especially after she has gone through a difficult period, and this is...

title: Interpretation of makeup in a dream for a single woman

preview.html: Interpretation of makeup in a dream for a single woman: There are many who wish to interpret dreams, as some interpreted that dreaming of makeup in a dream is considered a praiseworthy dream, which indicates an increase in money and livelihood. Through this article.You may also be interested in the following: Bathing in a dream. Interpretation of makeup in a dream for a single woman. Interpretation of makeup in a dream for a single woman. An unmarried girl may see herself wearing makeup, as this indicates that she will obtain a high position at work, God willing. As Ibn Sirin explained Makeup in a dream generally shows the strength of the dreamer’s personality and the extent of his ability to take responsibility when facing difficult circumstances. When an unmarried girl sees herself wearing a lot of makeup, this is considered an abomination that will harm her and is seen as a warning to stay away from the path she is on because of problems and confrontations. The difficulty in it. It is permissible for an unmarried woman in a dream to wear makeup in front of a woman, and this is considered a bad thing, which indicates that there are many people speaking ill of her and her reputation. Some interpreters explained that makeup in a dream indicates how close a person is to God and performing some good deeds. It is possible Interpretation of makeup in a dream for an unmarried woman as marriage to a wealthy person who is distinguished by his good morals. As for the situation in which an unmarried woman gets rid of her makeup on her face in a dream, this is evidence of comfort, goodness, and great reward from God. As Imam Al-Sadiq explained that the status of a woman Being unmarried in a girl’s dream indicates her weak personality and her inability to bear difficult responsibilities. You may be interested: Pregnancy in a dream Interpretation of makeup in a dream for a married woman The dream of makeup varies depending on the social status of the dreamer. Scientists have interpreted that seeing makeup in a dream for a married woman indicates the extent of her love and attachment With her husband and that there is a good relationship between them. When a married woman wears kohl in a dream, this indicates the comfort, kindness, and happiness that she will enjoy in her married life, and if she suffers from problems with her husband, the situation will change for the better, and God knows best. Penguin in a dream. Interpretation of makeup in a dream for a pregnant woman. As for the condition of A pregnant woman wearing makeup in a dream indicates some good and happy signs for the dreamer to enjoy the coming period. Some people find it difficult, or dream of applying makeup to a pregnant woman, this indicates that she is feeling a state of extreme tension and anxiety about pregnancy and is afraid of the day of giving birth. When she dreams If a pregnant woman buys makeup, this means that she will get a lot of good things, abundant money and abundant living. However, if the pregnant woman sees that she is wearing makeup and she is happy, this indicates that the day of birth will be easy and that she will not suffer from any problems or problems in giving birth and the child will come out safe and sound. And God knows best. Washing the dead. Interpretation of makeup in a dream for a man. Although seeing makeup in a dream is one of the praiseworthy dreams for a woman, it is

title: Interpretation of a dream about a man I know touching me

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about a man I know touching me. I am influenced by the interpretation of a dream about someone I know on many topics and situations, among which we mention the following: If this dream comes to a girl, this is evidence that there is someone who helps her with many problems and solves them. And seeing someone touching me in a dream with a girl and he was a young man is this. A sign of the approaching date of her engagement. Also, if she saw in her dream that a man was touching her and he was in her house. It is a sign of marriage for a single woman, and it is a traditional marriage that has stability in her life. If the father touching the girl is strong evidence of the good family relations that fill their lives. This indicates The dream also indicates the need to help the father in solving the problems in which the one who sees this dream falls into. It is another evidence of the closeness of a friend or colleague to our problems and our lives and his assistance to us in solving issues and problems related to us. And any of us who saw in her dream someone touching her while her hands were cut off, this represents Someone close to her will help her. We chose for you: Interpretation of a dream about a person you love holding your hand for singles, married people, and men. You dream of touching your husband. There are many cases in which women see their husbands touching their husbands in a dream, and many interpreters have interpreted it as follows: If a woman sees that she is touching her husband’s hand, this An indication of the strength of their relationship that unites them. Touching the hand of another unmarried woman in a dream is evidence of the problems facing a man. She sees in her dream that her husband holds her hand and then leaves it, so that is a great sign for him. The husband abandons his wife in the most difficult and important moments. When she needs it. But if he does not let her go quickly and keeps her for a while, this is evidence of the strong family ties that unite them. If a divorced woman touches her ex-husband’s hand and continues to hold it, this is evidence of her desire not to return to him again. It gives her an indication that her life is The current divorced woman is better off than she was with her husband. The same is true for the widow when she is seen holding her husband’s hand, which indicates that she is raising her children well. Interpretation of a dream about a stranger touching Most of the interpretations of a dream about a person we know in a dream indicate a new friendship developing between the two, but if the person The one whom we do not know or is unfamiliar with and touches her in the dream. Be evidence of help from someone you do not know. The same is true if the dreamer gets married and touches her with lust. The case of a strange man touching a woman’s body is evidence of support and that this man will be her support in life. And the situations in which she A pregnant woman has a vision, and its interpretation is that this man she sees is support and support in her life. A stranger can be good or bad, or have feelings of anger towards us, and its interpretation is caution and caution. The many problems that afflict the sleeper should be taken into account if a strange and ugly person touches him. As for Strangely enough, if we do not know him and he wants to do good work for us, he will take our hands. It will be a testimony to the problems that he will solve without resorting to other people to help him. Interpretation of a dream about a man touching my private parts in a dream by Ibn Sirin. One of the most famous dreams that appeared in many dreams is bugs.

title: Learn about the interpretation of a dream about death for a married woman according to Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about death for a married woman: Death is one of the causes of sadness and crying over loss. As for death in a dream, is it good news or is there warning food behind this vision? This is what we will explain in the following lines, read with us. Interpretation of a dream about death for a married woman: Seeing death in a dream for a married woman symbolizes the goodness and benefit that she will receive in the coming days of her life, and the death of her husband in a dream for a woman indicates that she will find a job opportunity abroad for some time. Witnessing the death of a relative in a dream indicates the disputes that will arise between them and may cause a rift, and if she sees in her dream that he is dying, it leads to some strife and marital problems. Which leads to separation, and hearing wailing and crying in the dreamer’s sleep indicates ill health and may lead to his death. Interpretation of a dream about death for a married woman by Ibn Sirin Ibn Sirin says that seeing the death of a married woman in a dream symbolizes the acquisition of great wealth and she will move to a larger and more beautiful house. Seeing death Someone she knows in the woman’s dream and she is not sad indicates the good news that she will learn in the next life and that will change her life for the better, and the death of one of her children in her sleep leads her to commit sins and disobedience and brag about it in front of people. Asrar website for dream interpretation is a website specialized in dream interpretation in the Arab world, write Just a website about the secrets of dream interpretation. Search for it on Google and get the correct interpretations. Interpretation of a dream about death for a pregnant woman. Seeing the death of her husband in a dream for a pregnant woman indicates keeping him away from bad friends, correcting his situation, and hoping that God will forgive him his sins so that he can become a new man. Seeing a woman watching a funeral in her dream symbolizes To her exposure to pressure and psychological distress on her fetus and from the stage of birth, and death in a vision indicates her victory over her enemies and her liberation from them and the experiences in which she fell. Inside because of them. Interpretation of a dream about the death of a married woman. Seeing the death of a married woman’s husband in a dream symbolizes her betrayal in the coming period with one of her friends who wants to destroy her life and she must take care of her home and children so that she does not suffer from a serious problem. Loss, and the death of her imprisoned husband in a dream indicates the approaching release of his release. If she sees in her dream that her husband is wrapped up and there are disagreements between them, this indicates their separation in the coming period due to lack of cohesion and lack of understanding between them and seeing the death of the sleeping husband in. Seeing the death of a deceased person in a dream for a married woman indicates the adversities and obstacles that she will face in the near future and her inability to bear responsibility alone due to her husband’s weak character and the death of the deceased again in the dream. For a woman, it symbolizes raising her children and helping them form a good relationship later. Watching the death of a dead person in a sleeper’s dream indicates transformations that will occur in his next life and changes in it, and the death of a dead person without lamentation or crying indicates good news that she will learn in the near future. Interpretation of a dream

Seeing a woman watching a funeral in her dream symbolizes To her exposure to pressure and psychological distress on her fetus and from the stage of birth, and death in a vision indicates her victory over her enemies and her liberation from them and the experiences in which she fell. Inside because of them. Interpretation of a dream about the death of a married woman. Seeing the death of a married woman’s husband in a dream symbolizes her betrayal in the coming period with one of her friends who wants to destroy her life and she must take care of her home and children so that she does not suffer from a serious problem. Loss, and the death of her imprisoned husband in a dream indicates the approaching release of his release. If she sees in her dream that her husband is wrapped up and there are disagreements between them, this indicates their separation in the coming period due to lack of cohesion and lack of understanding between them and seeing the death of the sleeping husband in. Seeing the death of a deceased person in a dream for a married woman indicates the adversities and obstacles that she will face in the near future and her inability to bear responsibility alone due to her husband’s weak character and the death of the deceased again in the dream. For a woman, it symbolizes raising her children and helping them form a good relationship later. Watching the death of a dead person in a sleeper’s dream indicates transformations that will occur in his next life and changes in it, and the death of a dead person without lamentation or crying indicates good news that she will learn in the near future. Interpretation of a dream

title: Interpretation of dreams about cold and snow Seeing snow in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream of white snow by Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of a dream of snow for single people. Interpretation of a dream of snow for a pregnant woman. Interpretation of a dream of walking in the snow. Dream of snow covering the ground. Interpretation of a dream of eating snow. Interpretation of a dream of snow in summer. Interpretation of snow in a dream by Imam al-Sadiq. Falling snow in a dream generally indicates accidents, illness, evil, and torture, but interpreters sometimes interpret it from Where there is goodness and blessing. Follow with us the interpretation of seeing cold and snow in a dream: According to Ibn Sirin, snow in a dream is a sign of the evil and corruption of the earth, because it spoils crops, trees, and fruits and increases the suffering of the poor, their illnesses, and diseases, and snow sometimes indicates war, drought, and the end. In another context, snow indicates fertility. Wealth, abundance of food, and torrents flowing between trees, and whoever sees heavy snow in a dream indicates that he will obtain a lot of goodness, light, and blessings, and the same applies to the siege and oppression to which a person is exposed. Owners of power, and whoever sees snow in homes and shops, that is, in a place other than that, this indicates torment, affliction, and ills. Snow in a dream, according to interpreters, shows the flogging of Satan or the king and there is no good in it, because it obscures truth and goodness and destroys places of agriculture and plants. Some interpreters say that snow in a dream is essentially the torment of the ruler of his flock, and if the snow melts quickly in a dream, this is a sign of the departure of worry and worry, and whoever hides in a dream to protect him. Himself from the cold of snow, this means patience and perseverance and that he is a stable person who is not afraid of anything and everything. Interpretation of snow in a dream - YouTube

title: What is the interpretation of a dream about carrying a boy in a dream according to Ibn Sirin?

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about pregnancy: Pregnancy and childbirth in a dream are good news in general and good news for money and health, but scholars may differ in the interpretation of her dream about pregnancy. Some of them praise this vision and others see that giving birth to a girl is better than a boy. In a dream, and in this article we will point out the most important hundreds of interpretations of a dream about pregnancy giving birth to major scholars and translators, led by Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of a dream about pregnancy There are many interpretations of a dream about pregnancy and it has been found that it has positive and negative connotations: Pregnancy with a child in a dream is considered good news for someone who dreams of abundant nutrition. And perhaps an imminent pregnancy. It is said that if a woman dreams that she is pregnant with a boy, she will triumph over her enemies and escape their evils. Seeing a pregnant girl in a married woman’s dream portends good circumstances between her and her husband after a period of disagreements and quarrels. Interpretation of a dream about giving birth to a boy by Ibn Sirin Ibn Sirin mentioned in His interpretation of a dream about pregnancy is as follows: Ibn Sirin mentioned that the interpretation of a dream about a boy being pregnant for an unmarried woman does not deserve praise and may warn her of distress and unhappiness in her life. A pregnancy is born in a married woman’s dream, and it is a vision that indicates the pursuit of livelihood and abundance of money. Whoever sees in a dream that His wife is pregnant with a son, he will get a promotion at work and take a position of influence and authority. Interpretation of a dream about pregnancy, a boy for a single woman. When we interpret a single woman’s vision that she is pregnant with a boy, the interpretations are as follows: The interpretation of a dream that she is carrying a boy for an unmarried woman could be a warning for her not to approach From an evil and malicious person trying to woo her in the name of love. But if a girl sees that she will become pregnant and give birth to a handsome son, she will marry a good man with a good character. Interpretation of a dream about a pregnancy born to a married woman. Jurists say that seeing a married woman pregnant with a son carries her with abundant good news for their livelihood and the improvement of their material conditions. Interpret Ibn Shaheen dreams of giving birth to a son for a married woman who has children from her as a sign of the imminence of pregnancy and the birth of a new child. However, if the dreamer does not give birth and is infertile, and she sees in her dream that she is pregnant with a boy, then the vision can warn her of a year of severe hardship and drought in her life. Whereas if The wife saw in a dream that she was pregnant with a boy and became sad. She may face severe disagreements and problems that will disturb her life. Interpretation of a dream about pregnancy: A boy for a pregnant woman. Ibn Shaheen says: If a pregnant woman dreams in the first months that she is pregnant with a boy, then the vision indicates the opposite, and she will give birth to a girl. As for the interpretation of a dream The birth of a son for a pregnant woman who is about to give birth and in the last months of her life can warn her of problems during childbirth. Interpretation of a dream about pregnancy for a divorced woman. Scientists do not praise the interpretation of a dream about giving birth to a son for a divorced woman, so we see in their interpretations: Seeing a divorced woman pregnant with a son can warn her of problems. And grave worries in the coming period of her life, and she must face crises calmly and wisely in order to overcome them safely. Jurists say that if a divorced woman sees in her dream that she is pregnant with a son, she may have a year full of sadness, and God knows best. As for the dreamer who sees that she is about to give birth

Jurists say that if a divorced woman sees in her dream that she is pregnant with a son, she may have a year full of sadness, and God knows best. title: What you do not know about Ibn Sirin’s interpretation of seeing a canal in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation and interpretation of seeing a canal in a dream: A canal is a small sea of ​​water, but it is stagnant, and the water in it is often fresh. Seeing a canal in a dream indicates a change that is occurring in the life of the dreamer, and this change can be positive or negative and varies according to the person, whether male or female. Interpretation of a dream about seeing a canal in a dream: Seeing a canal in a dream indicates joy and happiness in the real life of the dreamer and it can be It is a sign of marriage or accepting a new job and it can be a sign of obtaining abundant money and extreme wealth that leads a person to a happy life. It can indicate the loss of a loved one to the dreamer, if the water is contaminated, and if the water is distributed freely, this indicates that The person is good and provides a favor. The canal in a dream by Ibn Sirin Ibn Sirin claims that seeing a canal in a dream indicates serious changes in the life of the dreamer and will be positive, and if there is a lot of water in the canal, it means a significant decrease in prices and a recovery in the country’s economy. Ibn Sirin believes Walking on water easily indicates success in all areas of life, such as work, study, trade, and others. Seeing running water in a dream: It is said: Whoever sees running water in his house or on some of his property, this indicates that he will be harmed by one of the unjust rulers and will only emerge from this ordeal. With the help of movement and obedience to it.Interpretation of a dream about swimming in a canalSwimming in an unmarried woman’s dream can indicate a good meaning and it can indicate a very bad meaning. If she sees that she is swimming in the water very professionally, this is a sign of the stability of her emotional state and also a sign that she has psychological health. Great, but if she dreamed that the water she was swimming in was muddy water with a lot of dirt and impurities, then this is a sign that the young man she loves is wearing a mask of false love and wants chaos. With her feelings. If an unmarried woman dreams that she is floating in a place with clear, clean water and no unpleasant odors coming out of it, then this is a good sign that the man she loves does not want something that is forbidden from her, God forbid. Stagnant water in a dream is unlucky, especially if it contains On a lot of dirt and full of dirt. He leaves the country and may meet people who are bandits and may be attacked by a predator who prevents him from going to the country he wants to reach. If a married woman swims in water full of garbage and pollution, this is a sign that her husband is impotent. The interpretation of this vision in a pregnant woman’s dream depends on her ability to Swimming. If she sees that she is swimming smoothly, this is a sign of easy birth, but if she dreams that she lacks the ability to swim and swim. She cannot move from her position or is on the verge of suffocation, so this is a sign of difficulty in childbirth. Ibn Sirin pointed out and said: If the dreamer washes his feet in a dream with water from a lake or canal, this is evidence that he is walking on paths that lead to everything that God has forbidden in his book. title: Interpretation of seeing Tawaf around the Holy Kaaba in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of the vision of encircling the Kaaba by Ibn Sirin, Al-Nabulsi, Ibn Shaheen, Ibn Kathir, and Imam Al-Sadiq. Scholars and jurists interpreted dreams and visions through the website visionroy2a.com Since seeing circumambulation of the Kaaba in a dream is a sign of the high morals and good circumstances of the pioneer, we will talk about the interpretation of this vision for an unmarried girl, A married woman, a pregnant woman, a man and a young man. What is the interpretation of seeing a single girl circumambulating the Kaaba in a dream: Seeing an unmarried girl walking around the Kaaba in a dream indicates the fulfillment of dreams that she has always wanted. Seeing a single girl standing in front of the Kaaba in a dream is one of the promising visions that appear in response God for all her prayers. Seeing an unmarried woman seeing the Kaaba in a dream indicates her high morals, people’s love for her and her kind heart. Seeing entering the Kaaba and walking around it in a dream is a sign of a happy marriage to a young man of good character and good character. See also: Interpretation of seeing the Kaaba being demolished in a dreamWhat is a woman’s interpretation A married woman who sees Tawaf the Kaaba in a dream: Seeing a married woman walking around the Kaaba in a dream indicates that it brings her good and abundant strength or the ability to achieve all dreams in the future. Seeing a married woman walking around the Kaaba in a dream Good luck with a happy pregnancy soon. Seeing Tawaf the Kaaba In a dream for a married woman, it is a sign of great success in her family life. Seeing a married woman walking around the Kaaba in a dream indicates her high morals and standing by her husband to make him happy and secure their future. See also: Interpretation of seeing Mecca in a dream. What is the interpretation of seeing a pregnant woman walking around the Kaaba in a dream: Seeing a woman A pregnant woman walking around the Kaaba in a dream indicates the provision of a good, handsome boy. Seeing a pregnant woman walking around the Kaaba in a dream indicates God’s response to her prayers and reconciliation in all matters. Seeing a pregnant woman walking around the Kaaba in a dream is a sign of her husband’s bright future. Seeing a pregnant woman walking around the Kaaba in a dream appears That her fetus is in good health and in good health. See also: The prayer for visiting the Kaaba is written. What is the interpretation of a divorced woman who sees circumambulating the Kaaba in a dream: Seeing in a dream a divorced woman walking around the Holy Kaaba announces that it will bring goodness and a lot of sustenance and blessing. The final vision of circumambulating the Kaaba in a dream indicates the fulfillment of All the dreams and aspirations that she dreams of. What is the interpretation of a man who sees the Kaaba in a dream: A man who sees the Kaaba in a dream indicates God’s response to her prayers and his high social status. A man who sees the Kaaba in a dream indicates the approach of the Gulf and the disappearance of all worries and sorrows, or indicates the return of one of the individuals. His family is from travels. Seeing a man walking around the Kaaba in a dream is one of the praiseworthy visions that shows infinite goodness. See also: A written supplication for drinking Zamzam water. What is the interpretation of a young man who sees circumambulating the Kaaba in a dream: Seeing a young man walking around the Kaaba in a dream indicates his great fame among the people Because of his many good deeds or it indicates an important position and position because it is one of the visions
